text: Margaret Court (n√©e Smith; born 16 July 1942), also known as Margaret Smith Court, is a retired Australian tennis player and former world #1. In tennis, she won 24 major titles (11 in the open era). That is more than any other player in history. She is currently a Christian minister in Perth, Western Australia.
